es.csic.iiia.nsm.perception
Class Monitor

java.lang.Object
  es.csic.iiia.nsm.perception.Monitor

public class Monitor
extends java.lang.Object

A monitor is employed by the Norm Synthesis Machine to perceive the scenario of the system it synthesises norms for. The monitor incorporates a set of sensors that perceive the scenario in a distributed manner.

Author:
"Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)"
